error: illegal escape sequence: \x
- testdata/err/string_literal_bad_escape_sequence.tn:1:18
1 | main = || { "foo \x bar \y baz" };
  |                  ^ bad escape sequence
- testdata/err/string_literal_bad_escape_sequence.tn:1:13
1 | main = || { "foo \x bar \y baz" };
  |             ------------------- in this string literal
error: illegal escape sequence: \y
- testdata/err/string_literal_bad_escape_sequence.tn:1:25
1 | main = || { "foo \x bar \y baz" };
  |                         ^ bad escape sequence
- testdata/err/string_literal_bad_escape_sequence.tn:1:13
1 | main = || { "foo \x bar \y baz" };
  |             ------------------- in this string literal
